澡垢索疵.definition: to wash the dirt to find a defect (idiom); to find fault; to nitpick

澡塘.definition: communal bath; common pool in bath house

澡罐.definition: tub (used for ablutions in a monastery)

澡身浴德.definition: to bathe the body and cleanse virtue (idiom); to improve oneself by meditation; cleanliness is next to godliness
